extendedInfo.description: Seven Lakes State Park guide by Exploration Guides.This app is everything you need to visit Seven Lakes State Park, located near Holly, Michigan, northwest of Pontiac.  Whether you're hiking, mountain biking, cross-country skiing, bird watching, kayaking, or exploring, Exploration Guides' Seven Lakes State Park gives you everything you need to make the most of your visit.Includes:* More than 17km of full, surveyed trail maps!* Suggested trails* Favorite trail: pick a trail and it highlights on the map* GPS navigation - includes the ultimate "You are here!" * Electronic compass* Camera integration: take pictures and send to email, FaceBook, and more* Major points of interest, including Exploration Guides' custom web pages with all the information you'll need* View maps with either the standard Google Maps view, or areal photography/satellite view* Park your car, touch the screen, and your car appears on the map.  Never lose your car again! (yes, you can use this outside the park, too!)* Check current weather, or the 10-day forecast for the park* Get turn-by-turn directions to the park with Google NavigationWe're all explorers.  You just need the right guide!
